name: Reypunzel
description:
Reypunzel is a web game made with GDevelop for the Odd Weekend Jam 17.  The theme was BEARDS.  Better played at FULLSCREEN.

Prince Reypunzel was kidnapped by the Dark Wizard and was been kept in the tallest tower in the land by a strong spell.

It is up to you, brave female rescuer, to save the prince by breaking the spell, just by reaching him.

Your only protection will be your patience and reaction skills.

Your only means to get to the prince will be ... his beard.

You see ... Reypunzel has been trapped for a very long time without a shave ... use ARROW KEYS to climb his beard ...
